info.description: This is the API documentation for the Event Center service.
info.title: Event Center API

get.description: Retrieves a list of all channels, with optional filtering by channel type and tags, and pagination, using CQRS.

parameters.description: Filter by channel type (e.g., email, sms)
parameters.name: channelType

parameters.description: Number of records to skip for pagination
parameters.name: skipCount

parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return per page (1-100)
parameters.name: maxResultCount

post.description: Creates a new channel with the provided details.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input or validation error

409.description: Conflict - Channel with the same name already exists

get.description: Retrieves a single channel's details using its unique identifier via CQRS.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid channel ID format

404.description: Not Found - Channel with specified ID does not exist

put.description: Updates an existing channel's details using its unique identifier via CQRS.

200.description: Success response with updated channel data

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input or validation error

404.description: Not Found - Channel with specified ID does not exist

delete.description: Deletes a channel using its unique identifier via CQRS.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid channel ID format

404.description: Not Found - Channel with specified ID does not exist

post.description: Creates a new channel with the provided details using CQRS pattern.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input or validation error

get.description: Retrieves a single channel's details using its unique identifier via CQRS.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid channel ID format

404.description: Not Found - Channel with specified ID does not exist

get.description: Retrieve a list of messages with optional filtering via CQRS pattern

parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return
parameters.name: maxResultCount

post.description: Send a message to multiple channels using a template via CQRS pattern

get.description: Retrieve a specific message by its ID via CQRS pattern

post.description: Create a new message template for a specific channel type via CQRS pattern

get.description: Retrieve a specific template by its ID via CQRS pattern
Retrieve a list of messages with optional filtering

parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return
parameters.name: maxResultCount

post.description: Send a message to multiple channels using a template

get.description: Retrieve a specific message by its ID
Retrieve a list of templates with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new message template for a specific channel type

get.description: Retrieve a specific template by its ID

put.description: Update an existing template by its ID

delete.description: Delete an existing template by its ID
